data.title: Burke County Chamber of Commerce
data.meta_site_name: Burke County Chamber of Commerce - Growing Business. Building Community.
data.text:
As a paid member in good standing, you are entitled to a number of benefits as provided by the Burke County Chamber of Commerce to help you promote your business to the local, regional, and national community. Our mission statement is; “Growing Business. Building Community.” The Burke County Chamber of Commerce has created an important brand, that we believe will help improve your business. If you would like to use our logo, you will be granted to use our name and logo. This is an exclusive membership benefit and is not available to any business without being a member of the Burke County Chamber of Commerce.

Please contact us to gain access to this logo!

Member to Member Deals

Your Burke County Chamber of Commerce membership pays for itself with the Member to Member Deals (M2M) program. Member to Member Deals allow members to save money on goods and services ranging from entertainment to advertising to insurance, and most importantly, gives participating members a vehicle to expose a discount to the thousands of employees of our member businesses.

Participation in the M2M program is FREE and only available to Chamber members! By participating in this program you will gain:

Increased visibility in Chamber publications and promotions

Increased exposure on www.burkecounty.org

Increased sales & revenue for your business

Access to the vast purchasing power of Chamber members and their employees

All Burke County Chamber members are encouraged to offer their own Member to Member Deal for their company! Deal Guidelines:

Discounts must apply to actual goods and services

Discount must be shown in a percentage or dollar amount

Free consultation offers cannot be accepted

Discount is for Burke County Chamber of Commerce members only

Check with manager or owner for any and all exclusions prior to purchase

Verification of discount eligibility is up to the individual business owner

To enroll in M2M program, contact your Chamber Team!
